definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
to perch/to rest (of birds)/to dwell/to live/to stay

sentences.english: Aquatic Form is now offered by druid trainers at level 16.
sentences.chinese: 水棲形式不妨在16級時間接從鍛練師處練習。

sentences.english: European cave-dwelling aquatic salamander with permanent external gills.
sentences.chinese: 長有永久性外部鰓的歐洲穴居水棲蠑螈。

sentences.english: Motts are semi-aquatic herbivores that dwell in underground mudbank burrows.
sentences.chinese: 莫特獸是半水棲的草食動物，居住在泥灘地下洞穴中。

sentences.english: Any of various minute aquatic animals of the phylum Gastrotricha, having a wormlike, ciliated body.
sentences.chinese: 任一種微小的腹毛類水棲動物，身體似蟲狀，環帶綱。

sentences.english: They are mainly small fish for food, followed by aquatic insect larvae , and so on.
sentences.chinese: 它們主要以小型魚類爲食，其次爲水棲昆蟲的幼蟲等。

sentences.english: Do you like to watch those aquatic animals？
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡看那些水棲動物嗎？

sentences.english: Aquatic Form is now available from druid trainers at level 16.
sentences.chinese: 水棲形態可以在16級時直接從訓練師處學習。
